name: gin-systray-starter
description: Template/Starter code for Go application with Gin, System Tray, Gorm, Air, Swagger, JWT

scripts.setup:all: cd client && npm i && cd ../ && go mod tidy
scripts.serve:all: cd client && npm run serve && cd ../ && npm run serve
scripts.build:all: cd client && npm run build && cd ../ && npm run build

author: jinyaoMa
